title: 3 and Out - Lamar's Agentless Extension Risk; Anti-Moving the Combine
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Lamar's Agentless Extension Risk; Anti-Moving the Combine
description:
In this episode, John discusses the risks Lamar Jackson is taking by not hiring an agent to negotiate his extension, why the league moving the out of Indy isn't a good idea like moving the draft. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
